Class DicooglePlatformProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.dicoogle.plugins.DicooglePlatformProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DicooglePlatformInterface

    public class DicooglePlatformProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements DicooglePlatformInterface
    A proxy to the implementations of Plugin Controller.

      • index

        public java.util.List<Task<Report>> index(java.net.URI path)
        Description copied from interface: DicooglePlatformInterface
        Easily performs an indexation procedure over all active indexers. This operation is asynchronous and returns immediately.
        Specified by:
        index in interface DicooglePlatformInterface
        Parameters:
        path - the path to index
        Returns:
        a list of asynchronous tasks, one for each provider

      • indexBlocking

        public java.util.List<Report> indexBlocking(java.net.URI path)
        Description copied from interface: DicooglePlatformInterface
        Easily performs an indexation procedure over all active indexers. This operation is synchronous and will wait until all providers have finished indexing.
        Specified by:
        indexBlocking in interface DicooglePlatformInterface
        Parameters:
        path - the path to index
        Returns:
        a list of reports, one for each provider
